page.title: 15St Peter's Church
page.content: St Peters church is probably one of the most interesting churhes in Essex. The Nave & Chancel are believed to have been built in the early fifteenth century. Other parts were added later. However there was a church on this site in the doomsday book. Up until a hundred years ago the roof was thatched. Because the church has dirt foundations & suffers from woodworm, it smells damp & musty. There is a magnificent organ which still works. The church will soon have to close because of its condition. Also the parish is very small & normally only five people attend. It will take about four to five thousand pounds to restore.
